author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Detect and remove all duplicate pixels, after unpacking each pixel module but before running the clustering.
Use shared memory for inter-thread communication and to speed up marking and detecting the duplicates.

#### PR validation:

Running the online pixel reconstruction on GPU over non-problematic events does not show any difference, and is only 2-3% slower: `1532  13 ev/s` vs `1570  14 ev/s`.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR.

Backport of #38946 for data taking.
title: Detect and remove all duplicate pixels [12.4.x]
